Talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Did you meet the <clr:0000>chief <clr:ffff>already? That girl
and the survey team might be youngsters,
but they're plenty knowledgeable.
Why, <clr:0000>they've taught me all sorts of things<clr:ffff>.
Won't be too long before I'm as wise as
they are!
Talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Ah, that reminds me. The prices at the 
<clr:0000>clothes shop<clr:ffff> are <clr:0000>through the roof<clr:ffff>—
now's not the best time for shoppin'.
I heard there's a reason though. I hope it
gets sorted soon.
Talk_Greeting0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Hey! Good day to see the sights
around here.
Talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there, kid! Did you come to see the
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> too?

We might bump into each other when
you're running around the village, seeing
the sights.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you want to learn about the Ring Ruins,
be sure to ask the <clr:0000>Zonai Survey Team<clr:ffff>
people here. Or the <clr:0000>village chief<clr:ffff>.
Talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Ease>Now that I've finished sightseeing for
today,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>I'm in the market for some
souvenirs.
And if I'm going shoppin', I'll need a new
outfit. Soon as I get my wallet in order,
it'll be new <clr:0000>clothes<clr:ffff> for me!
Talk_Greeting0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Hey there! Hope you're not skipping
lunch.
Talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>You'll find her and a few team members
under one of the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>—the one
<clr:0000>floating<clr:ffff> on the north side of the village.
Talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Now that I've finished <clr:0000>touring the ruins<clr:ffff>,
for today, I'm in the market for some
souvenirs.
The <clr:0000>ingredients shop<clr:ffff> looks like my best
bet. Only problem is, they've got so much
for sale—I don't know where to start.
Talk_Greeting0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there! Going without sleep to see
the sights, huh?
Talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Wow! <sp:5:0:0>You sure helped me feel deep down
how ancient it is, kiddo. I got a mite too
excited for a man my age.<sp:0:4:0>I'm going to keep wandering around here.
Hopefully we'll see each other again on
our tourist travels.
Talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired>But when's this rain going to leave off?
I've got some important sightseeing to do.
WakkaCharm: I should buy a garland too.
Talk_Greeting0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Hey there... Seeing the sights isn't as
much fun in the rain, huh?
Talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>I'm just a simple tourist like you, kiddo!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>The <clr:0000>Zonai Survey Team <clr:ffff>or village <clr:0000>chief<clr:ffff>
can tell you more about the Ring Ruins.
Talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Now that I've finished sightseeing for
today, I've been lookin' for souvenirs...

But with all these tourists running around,
the shops can't keep up. What a mess.
Talk_Greeting0005: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there! Hope you didn't skip dinner.
Talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>Did those <clr:0000>ring garlands<clr:ffff> catch your fancy?


I've heard they're gettin' popular. I saw
one at a stable myself and thought it
looked real fine.
Rumor has it they bring <clr:0000>marriage<clr:ffff>. Maybe
I'll pick one up as a souvenir—never too
late, eh?
Talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Ease>Now that I've finished sightseeing for
today, I'm in the market for some
souvenirs.
They've got a fine selection for such a
small village. Right now, I'm enjoying
just lookin'!
Talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat>My, isn't it amazing how this <clr:0000>Ring Ruin<clr:ffff>
floats like that?

It was worth the trip just to see this.
Talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>By the by, the <clr:0000>ingredients shop <clr:ffff>is running
low on goods.

Too many tourists to keep up with the
demand, I think.
Talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Ah, by the way, the old dear at the
ingredients shop was saying they're
<clr:0000>running low on eggs<clr:ffff>.
Too many tourists to keep up with the
demand, I think.
Talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Ah! Before it slips my mind, you should
know the<clr:0000> inn<clr:ffff> isn't open for business.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>The owner's gone off somewhere. Real
shame, leaving folks inn-less.
Talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>Now that I've finished <clr:0000>touring the ruins<clr:ffff>
for today, I might get fancy and splurge
on a <clr:0000>soft bed<clr:ffff> at the inn tonight.
Talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat>My, isn't it amazing how this ruin floats?


I might be done with my sightseeing
around the village, but this spectacle
sure is something else!
